children.text: Worked on real-world AI solutions by building a hardware-independent attendance system and route optimization logic for office and field employees.

responsibilities: Designed and developed an AI-powered attendance system without relying on biometric or physical hardware
Implemented Wi-Fi–based attendance logic for office employees, allowing attendance only on authorized office networks
Developed optimized route validation logic for sales employees using the Traveling Salesman Problem (TSP)
Ensured scalability and accuracy for both office-based and field employee use cases
achievements: Delivered a unified attendance solution supporting both office and sales teams
Reduced dependency on physical attendance devices, improving flexibility and cost efficiency
Applied algorithmic problem-solving (TSP) in a real-world business scenario

children.text: Built a complete AI-powered mobile application featuring multiple chatbot personas and a robust multi-provider authentication system.

responsibilities: Developed a full React Native mobile application from scratch
Designed and integrated 16 unique AI chatbot personas with distinct behavior and responses
Implemented authentication flows including Google login, guest login, mobile number login, and email login
Handled frontend, backend integration, and AI chatbot logic
achievements: Delivered a production-ready AI chatbot mobile application
Successfully managed multiple authentication methods within a single app
Gained strong hands-on experience in full-stack AI application development

children.text: Worked on live production websites by building responsive and full-stack web features using modern JavaScript frameworks.

responsibilities: Contributed to the official Elation website (https://www.elation.digital)

Developed frontend and backend features using React.js and Next.js
Collaborated remotely with the team to deliver production-ready solutions
achievements: Deployed UI and functionality improvements on two live client-facing websites
Improved responsiveness and user experience across multiple devices
Strengthened practical skills in modern full-stack web development
